Sanitize R's version

sanitize_R_version.Rd

Used to validate R version, strip whitespaces and, optionally, to stripp off leading inequalities.

sanitize_R_version(R_version, clean = FALSE, R_version_min = "3.0.2")

Arguments

R_version

R version to use. Supports inequalities. Defaults to: paste0(">=", R.version$major, '.', R.version$minor).
clean

Boolean. If TRUE, ><= are removed. Defaults to FALSE.
R_version_min

Minimal supported R version. If NULL check won't be done. Default value is "3.0.2".

Contents

  • Arguments

Developed by Jon Hill, W. Lee Pang, Gábor Csárdi, Hadley Wickham, Winston Chang, Jim Hester, Martin Morgan, Dan Tenenbaum.
